channel.title: Loading .midi files from the cache?
channel.description:
I'm making a Music System, this is what I have so far:
[code=java] if (c.absX >= 3205 && c.absX <= 3216 && c.absY >= 3209 && c.absY <= 3229) { c.outStream.createFrame(74);//Lumbridge c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(76); [/code]
How can I make it so it loads specific .midi files from the cache:
[code=java] if (c.absX >= 3205 && c.absX <= 3216 && c.absY >= 3209 && c.absY <= 3229) { c.outStream.createFrame(74);//Lumbridge c.outStream.playMidi(./cache/midi/Harmony.midi) [/code]
That's just an example, but I hope you understand what I am trying to say. I've tried everything. And I am in need of some help.
-Thanks.

item.title: Loading .midi files from the cache?
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

I’m making a Music System, this is what I have so far:

if (c.absX >= 3205 && c.absX <= 3216 && c.absY >= 3209 && c.absY <= 3229) {
c.outStream.createFrame(74);//Lumbridge
c.outStream.writeWordBigEndian(76);

How can I make it so it loads specific .midi files from the cache:

if (c.absX >= 3205 && c.absX <= 3216 && c.absY >= 3209 && c.absY <= 3229) {
c.outStream.createFrame(74);//Lumbridge
c.outStream.playMidi(./cache/midi/Harmony.midi)

That’s just an example, but I hope you understand what I am trying to say. I’ve tried everything. And I am in need of some help.

-Thanks.
